properties.name: AsEmployee
properties.description: When set, the (non)-employees will be explicity filtered. Used primarily when Customers and Employees are split, but can also be used to make sure no Customers can login.

properties.name: AuthenticationToken
properties.description:
The current authenticationtoken, can be used to select the same OrganizationUnit when logging in onto a website with an anonymous token.
Or can be used when switching to another OrganizationUnit, no other properties are required in that case.

properties.name: Context
properties.description: Defines the context where the Login is done, can be used to alter some properties automatically when logging in.

properties.name: CustomAuthenticateData
properties.description: When using a custom authenticator, the data goes here.

properties.name: CustomAuthenticatorType
properties.description: When using a custom authenticator, the type goes here.

properties.name: IdentificationCode
properties.description: The employee IdentificationCode used to login by QR or PIN

properties.name: LanguageID
properties.description: The preferred Language for the session

properties.name: OrganizationUnitID
properties.description: Used to login to a specific OrganizationUnit

properties.name: Password
properties.description: The password associated with the Username

properties.name: PublicLogin
properties.description: No subnet check, but requests are only allowed to services with the AllowPublic attribute

properties.name: SelectFirstOrganizationUnit
properties.description: Login on the first OrganizationUnit in the tree where the user has the Login functionality

properties.name: TwoFactorAuthenticator
properties.description: The two-factor authenticator code that granted the confirmation token

properties.name: TwoFactorRememberMe
properties.description: If a successful two-factor authentication should be remembered on this IP address

properties.name: UserType
properties.description: Filters the available Roles/Functionalities when those are explicitly attached to an UserType

properties.name: Username
properties.description: Primary identifier of the user, can be an EmailAddress or Nickname

properties.name: TwoFactorAuthenticators
properties.description: The available two-factor authenticators, returned when the Authentication result is NeedsTwoFactorAuthentication, for use in a sequential Login call
